name: Rajeev Jacob
biography: Rajeev Jacob made his onscreen acting debut opposite Jessica Lange in her Emmy Award winning performance as Elsa Mars in "American Horror Story: Freakshow." His first film role was in the Academy Award nominated financial drama, "The Big Short," in which he supports Christian Bale in his Academy Award nominated role as Dr. Michael Burry. Rajeev studied acting under the guidance of Lisina Stoneburner at The Company Acting Studio, where his main focus was on the acting techniques of Konstantin Stanislavski and Stella Adler. He has appeared in multiple television series, films, and commercials. Being an exceptional musician, Rajeev produced music independently before pursuing a career in acting. He earned a degree in Philosophy and Theology from Franciscan University of Steubenville.::A human being
